body: Either solution proposed here so far would be wonderful. I'm the author of [GoConvey](https://github.com/smartystreets/goconvey), [gunit](https://github.com/smartystreets/gunit), and [assertions](https://github.com/smartystreets/assertions) and have long been frustrated that there wasn't a nice way to squelch/tweak the decorations added by the testing package.
